column1: Oleg Yur'yevich At'kov (Russian: ????? ???????? ???????; born May 5, 1949) is a Soviet cosmonaut.
He is married with one child.
He was selected as a cosmonaut on March 9, 1983.
Atkov flew as Doctor Cosmonaut on Soyuz T-10.
He spent 236 days 22 hours 49 minutes in space.
He then joined the institute of Clinical Cardiology.
He currently works as a specialist for telemedicine with the European Commission.
